chinese: 桃之夭夭、灼灼其華。之子于歸、宜其室家。
english: The peach tree is young and elegant;Brilliant are its flowers.This young lady is going to her future home,And will order well her chamber and house.

chinese: 桃之夭夭、有蕡其實。之子于歸、宜其家室。
english: The peach tree is young and elegant;Abundant will be its fruits.This young lady is going to her future home,And will order well her house and chamber.

chinese: 桃之夭夭、其葉蓁蓁。之子于歸、宜其家人。
english: The peach tree is young and elegant;Luxuriant are its leaves.This young lady is going to her future home,And will order well her family.
